mapper.select: SELECT SUM(IF(month = 'Jan', total, 0)) AS 'Jan', SUM(IF(month = 'Feb', total, 0)) AS 'Feb', SUM(IF(month = 'Mar', total, 0)) AS 'Mar', SUM(IF(month = 'Apr', total, 0)) AS 'Apr', SUM(IF(month = 'May', total, 0)) AS 'May', SUM(IF(month = 'Jun', total, 0)) AS 'Jun', SUM(IF(month = 'Jul', total, 0)) AS 'Jul', SUM(IF(month = 'Aug', total, 0)) AS 'Aug', SUM(IF(month = 'Sep', total, 0)) AS 'Sep', SUM(IF(month = 'Oct', total, 0)) AS 'Oct', SUM(IF(month = 'Nov', total, 0)) AS 'Nov', SUM(IF(month = 'Dec', total, 0)) AS 'Dec', SUM(total) AS total_yearly FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(pay_date, "%b") AS month, SUM(buy_amount) AS total FROM pay p LEFT JOIN buy b ON b.pay_no=p.pay_no WHERE pay_date <= NOW() AND pay_date >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 12 month) AND b.prod_no IN(#{value}) AND b.buy_code IN('paid') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(pay_date, "%m-%Y")) AS sub

SELECT COUNT(IF(gender_code IN('f'),gender_code,null)) female, COUNT(IF(gender_code IN('m'),gender_code,null)) male FROM (SELECT b.*,u.gender_code FROM buy b LEFT JOIN user u ON u.user_id = b.user_id AND b.buy_code IN('paid')) sub WHERE prod_no IN(#{value});

SELECT SUM(IF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') - SUBSTRING(u.birth_date,1,4) BETWEEN 10 AND 19 , 1, 0)) AS age_10, SUM(IF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') - SUBSTRING(u.birth_date,1,4) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 , 1, 0)) AS age_20, SUM(IF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') - SUBSTRING(u.birth_date,1,4) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 , 1, 0)) AS age_30, SUM(IF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') - SUBSTRING(u.birth_date,1,4) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 , 1, 0)) AS age_40 FROM buy b LEFT JOIN user u ON u.user_id = b.user_id WHERE prod_no IN(#{value});

SELECT COUNT(p.prod_no) prod_count, COUNT(DISTINCT p.creator) creator_count, sub.sales_count, COUNT(IF(DATE_FORMAT(p.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'),p.reg_date,NULL)) now_count FROM product p, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT prod_no) sales_count FROM buy WHERE prod_type IN('paper','ebook')) sub WHERE p.prod_type IN('paper','ebook');

SELECT SUM(IF(month = 'Jan', total, 0)) AS 'Jan', SUM(IF(month = 'Feb', total, 0)) AS 'Feb', SUM(IF(month = 'Mar', total, 0)) AS 'Mar', SUM(IF(month = 'Apr', total, 0)) AS 'Apr', SUM(IF(month = 'May', total, 0)) AS 'May', SUM(IF(month = 'Jun', total, 0)) AS 'Jun', SUM(IF(month = 'Jul', total, 0)) AS 'Jul', SUM(IF(month = 'Aug', total, 0)) AS 'Aug', SUM(IF(month = 'Sep', total, 0)) AS 'Sep', SUM(IF(month = 'Oct', total, 0)) AS 'Oct', SUM(IF(month = 'Nov', total, 0)) AS 'Nov', SUM(IF(month = 'Dec', total, 0)) AS 'Dec', SUM(total) AS total_yearly FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, "%b") AS month, SUM(cash_amount) AS total FROM cash WHERE reg_date <= NOW() AND reg_date >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 12 month) AND user_id IN(#{value}) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, "%m-%Y")) AS sub
